date_publish: In 2008, Klitschko stopped Thompson in the 11th round.
text: Wladimir Klitschko stopped Tony Thompson in the sixth round to retain his WBA, IBF and WBO heavyweight title belts Saturday night. The 36 - year - old champion Klitschko, 58 - 3 with 51 knockouts, floored Thompson with a big right hand near the end of the fifth round at Stade de Suisse, and the 40 - year - old American never recovered. The Ukrainian champion dropped Thompson again in the sixth, and referee Sam Williams gave the challenger a standing count before stopping the fight. Thompson, who was the mandatory challenger nominated by the IBF, dropped to 36 - 3.
